== Classroom Sessions ==

The Ubuntu Documentation Team is hosting a series of IRC-based Classroom sessions to help new contributors get involved with Documentation.

=== Schedule ===

Click <nowiki>[[DocumentationTeam-Classroom-trusty|here]]</nowiki> to edit schedule

=== Participating ===

Sessions all take place on Internet Relay Chat (IRC). If you want to participate, you just need to join #ubuntu-classroom and #ubuntu-classroom-chat on irc.freenode.net in your IRC client, or just <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-classroom%2Cubuntu-classroom-chat|click here for browser-based webchat]]</nowiki>.

The instructor will give the class in #ubuntu-classroom and attendees can chat about the class and ask questions in #ubuntu-classroom-chat.
